ticket.title: ruby script/server error
ticket.original-body:
when I try to type
script/server -e test, I get the following errors, I am new to ruby on rails and I am not sure how to sort this.
=> Booting WEBrick... c:/ruby/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.0.2/lib/active_support/dependenci es.rb:263:in `load_missing_constant': uninitialized constant ActionView::Action (NameError) from c:/ruby/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.0.2/lib/active_suppo rt/dependencies.rb:453:in `const_missing' from C:/CMM913-survey/vendor/plugins/selenium-on-rails/lib/selenium_on_r ails/selenese.rb:3 from c:/ruby/lib/ruby/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems/custom_require.rb:27:in `ge m_original_require' from c:/ruby/lib/ruby/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems/custom_require.rb:27:in `re quire' from c:/ruby/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.0.2/lib/active_suppo rt/dependencies.rb:496:in `require' from c:/ruby/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.0.2/lib/active_suppo rt/dependencies.rb:342:in `new_constants_in' from c:/ruby/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.0.2/lib/active_suppo rt/dependencies.rb:496:in `require' from C:/CMM913-survey/vendor/plugins/selenium-on-rails/lib/selenium_on_r ails.rb:4 ... 53 levels... from c:/ruby/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/rails-2.0.2/lib/commands/server.rb:3 9 from c:/ruby/lib/ruby/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems/custom_require.rb:27:in `ge m_original_require' from c:/ruby/lib/ruby/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems/custom_require.rb:27:in `re quire' from script/server:3
